creator: shakeel.muhammad@ssmb.com
text:
In Applet-Servlet communication, I send xml from applet 
to servlet. If I run JMeter Proxy Server and send
xml from applet through Proxy, xml at the Servlet has 
been found to be encoded (rather than in its original form).

[ As a work around, I used URLDecoder.decode ()  to decode xml data at Servlet 
end ]

Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
